name: LunchBreak
prompt: Ask if Alice and Bob in their offices are up for lunch. If yes, tell them that we'll meet in the lobby in 5 minutes. Come back and tell me who all are joining for lunch.

tests.test:
both_no :- replied("alice","no",_), replied("bob","no",_).
both_yes :- replied("alice","yes",_), replied("bob","yes",_).
             
alice_yes :- replied("alice","yes",_).
alice_no :- replied("alice","no",_).

bob_yes :- replied("bob","yes",_).
bob_no :- replied("bob","no",_).

:- alice_no, alice_yes.
:- bob_no, bob_yes.
:- not alice_no, not alice_yes.
:- not bob_no, not bob_yes.

:- t_go_to(X, T), @contains_any(X, "alice", "bob", "start_loc") = 0.


:- not t_ask("alice",_,_,_).
:- not t_ask("bob",_,_,_).
:- not replied(_,_,_).
:- not at("robot","start_loc", timeout).

meet(P) :- replied(P, "yes",T), t_say(X, T), @contains_all(X, "meet", "lobby", "5 minutes/five minutes") = 1.
report_joining(P, T) :- replied(P, "yes", _), t_say(X, T), @contains_all(X, P, "joining/join/come/coming","lunch") = 1.
joining(P) :- report_joining(P, _).
:- report_joining(P, T), not at("robot", "start_loc", T).

:- option(X), @contains_any(X, "yes", "no") = 0.

:- not joining("bob").
:- not joining("alice").
:- not meet("alice").
:- not meet("bob").

both_no :- replied("alice","no",_), replied("bob","no",_).
both_yes :- replied("alice","yes",_), replied("bob","yes",_).
             
alice_yes :- replied("alice","yes",_).
alice_no :- replied("alice","no",_).

bob_yes :- replied("bob","yes",_).
bob_no :- replied("bob","no",_).

:- alice_no, alice_yes.
:- bob_no, bob_yes.
:- not alice_no, not alice_yes.
:- not bob_no, not bob_yes.

:- t_go_to(X, T), @contains_any(X, "alice", "bob", "start_loc") = 0.


:- not t_ask("alice",_,_,_).
:- not t_ask("bob",_,_,_).
:- not replied(_,_,_).
:- not at("robot","start_loc", timeout).

meet(P) :- replied(P, "yes",T), t_say(X, T), @contains_all(X, "meet", "lobby", "5 minutes/five minutes") = 1.

joining(P) :- report_joining(P, _).
:- report_joining(P, T), not at("robot", "start_loc", T).

:- option(X), @contains_any(X, "yes", "no") = 0.

:- joining("bob").
:- joining("alice").
:- meet("alice").
:- meet("bob").

both_yes :- replied("alice","yes",_), replied("bob","yes",_).

name: StaplerSupply
prompt: Check every printer room for a stapler, and come back and tell me which ones do not have a stapler.

tests.test:
:- not t_go_to("printer room 1", _).
:- not t_go_to("printer room 2", _).
:- not t_go_to("printer room 3", _).
:- t_go_to(X, T), @contains_any(X, "printer", "start_loc") = 0.
:- t_is_in_room(X, _), X!="stapler".
 
:- t_say(X, _), @contains_all(X, "stapler", "printer room 2", "not/no/dont") = 0.

:- t_say(X, _), @contains_all(X, "stapler", "printer room 3", "not/no/dont") = 0.
:- t_say(X, _), @contains_all(X, "living", "not/no/dont") = 1.
:- not at("robot", "start_loc", timeout).

:- not t_go_to(_,_).
:- not t_say(_,_).
:- not t_is_in_room(_,_).

:- not t_go_to("printer room 1", _).
:- not t_go_to("printer room 2", _).
:- not t_go_to("printer room 3", _).
:- t_go_to(X, T), @contains_any(X, "printer", "start_loc") = 0.
:- t_is_in_room(X, _), X!="stapler".
 
:- t_say(X, _), @contains_all(X, "stapler", "printer room 2", "not/no/dont") = 0.

:- t_say(X, _), @contains_all(X, "stapler", "printer room 3", "not/no/dont") = 0.
:- t_say(X, _), @contains_all(X, "living", "not/no/dont") = 1.
:- not at("robot", "start_loc", timeout).

:- not t_go_to(_,_).
:- not t_say(_,_).
:- not t_is_in_room(_,_).

:- not t_go_to("printer room 1", _).
:- not t_go_to("printer room 2", _).
:- not t_go_to("printer room 3", _).
:- t_go_to(X, T), @contains_any(X, "printer", "start_loc") = 0.
:- t_is_in_room(X, _), X!="stapler".
 
:- t_say(X, _), @contains_all(X, "stapler", "printer room 2", "not/no/dont") = 0.

:- t_say(X, _), @contains_all(X, "stapler", "printer room 3", "not/no/dont") = 0.
:- t_say(X, _), @contains_all(X, "living", "not/no/dont") = 1.
:- not at("robot", "start_loc", timeout).

:- not t_go_to(_,_).
:- not t_say(_,_).
:- not t_is_in_room(_,_).

name: ElevatorTour
prompt: Go to the elevator. Wait until someone shows up and ask them if they are here for the tour. If yes, welcome them to the university, ask them to follow you, and take them to the main conference room. If not, wait for the next person. When you get to the conference room, say you have arrived at the conference room and also say enjoy your visit here!

tests.test:
:- not t_go_to("elevator", _).

robot_ask_tour :- at("robot", "elevator", T), at(P, "elevator", T), P != "robot",
    t_ask(P, X, _, T), @contains(X, "tour") = 1.
 
robot_welcome :- replied(_,"yes",T), t_say(X, T),
            @contains_all(X, "welcome", "university") = 1.

robot_follow :- replied(_,"yes",T), t_say(X, T),
            @contains_all(X, "follow") = 1, t_go_to("main conference room", T2),
            T <= T2.
   
robot_enjoy_visit :- at("robot", "main conference room", T), 
                t_say(X, T), @contains_all(X, "enjoy", "visit") = 1.


:- not robot_ask_tour.
:- not robot_follow.
:- not robot_welcome.
:- not robot_enjoy_visit.

:- not t_go_to("elevator", _).

robot_ask_tour :- at("robot", "elevator", T), at(P, "elevator", T), P != "robot",
    t_ask(P, X, _, T), @contains(X, "tour") = 1.
 
robot_welcome :- replied(_,"yes",T), t_say(X, T),
            @contains_all(X, "welcome", "university") = 1.

robot_follow :- replied(_,"yes",T), t_say(X, T),
            @contains_all(X, "follow") = 1, t_go_to("main conference room", T2),
            T <= T2.
   
robot_enjoy_visit :- at("robot", "main conference room", T), 
                t_say(X, T), @contains_all(X, "enjoy", "visit") = 1.


:- robot_ask_tour.
:- robot_follow.
:- robot_welcome.
:- robot_enjoy_visit.
:- not at("robot", "elevator", timeout).

name: FindBackpack
prompt: Check all conference rooms to find if there is a black backpack. If there is a black backpack, wait until someone shows up and ask them to put it in the basket; then bring it back to me. If no black backpack is found after visiting all conference rooms, repeat the above steps to find a black backpack for all offices.

name: DoubleitOrTakeitGame
prompt: You have one dollar. Go to every office and check if a person is there. If there is a person, tell them how much money you have right now. Then ask the person if they want to double it and offer it to the next person, or take it themselves. If they choose to double it, you double the money you have and keep going to the next room. If they choose to take it, you tell them how much money they will receive, and then come back and tell me where the person took the money and how much the person took. If no one takes the money after visiting all the rooms or you have more than 16 dollars, come back and tell me how much money you have.

name: MovieMessenger
prompt: Ask Sally in her office if she wants to go to the cinema with Mark. Go to Mark’s office and tell him Sally’s answer. If Sally says yes, ask Mark whether he wants to leave at 4PM, 5PM, or 6PM - then go tell Sally what time Mark is leaving.

name: HalloweenList
prompt: Go to every office, and if there is anyone there, ask if they'd like a chocolate, caramel, or gummy. Come back and tell me how many of each we need to buy.
